answer: Introducing the all-new SodaStream TERRA sparkling water maker! Say goodbye to uncomfortable plastic bottles and say hello to more comfort and hygiene with our dishwasher safe bottles. Not only are you helping the environment by saving thousands of bottles, but you can also customize your sparkling water with syrup. Plus, our new cylinder system makes changing the CO2 cartridge a breeze. Get everything you need in one box: the SodaStream TERRA machine, Quick-Connect CO2 cylinder, and two dishwasher safe bottles. Make the switch to SodaStream TERRA today!
